Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates Wendy Davis's stance on abortion by stating that she opposes any limits on abortion, without considering any exceptions or circumstances.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or backup information to support the assertion that Wendy Davis opposes any limits on abortion.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Wendy Davis's opposition to the new Pro-Life law in Texas translates to opposing any limits on abortion, which may not be an accurate assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: Wendy Davis's campaign spokesman provides an alternative explanation, stating that she opposes late-term abortions except in specific cases, such as when the life or health of the mother is endangered, or in cases of rape, incest, or severe fetal abnormalities.
